r.d: This extension provides an IBM database driver for PDO. This driver supports IBM DB2 Universal Database, IBM Cloudscape, Apache Derby databases and IDS (Informix Data Server).
r.n: Fixed: Segmentation fault on getColumnMeta Fixed: PDO_IBM driver needs to return SQL error codes Fixed: should throw a PDOException if someone tries to use DDL and placeholders Fixed: Nested queries returns corrupted rows or segmentation fault Fixed: Compilation error with php-5.4.x
